snippet: Mondelez International, maker of Oreos, will add “Oreo Thins” to its permanent lineup in the United States starting next week.
abstract: Mondelez International announces inclusion of Oreo Thins as part of its permanent lineup of products in United States, bid to appeal to grown-ups with slimmer version of its popular cookie.
lead_paragraph: Mondelez International, maker of Oreos, will add “Oreo Thins” to its permanent lineup in the United States starting next week.

headline.main: New ‘Sophisticated’ Oreos Get Permanent Spot in Stores
headline.print_headline: New ‘Sophisticated’ Oreos Get Permanent Spot in Stores
